actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide for the control of imported fire ants by permitting the judicious use of Mirex in coastal counties.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to modify his Mirex order of May 3 and June 30, 1972, to (1) delete the prohibition against aerial application of Mirex within coastal counties or parishes; and (2) permit such application by using the same standards applicable to noncoastal counties.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the control of imported fire ants by permitting the judicious use of Mirex in coastal counties.
